title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus A310 - starting from scratch
description:
In this video we will go through the full process of starting the Airbus A310 from dark until ready for taxying. During the video I will share some tips and tricks which I found while doing some research before creating this video.

Below you can find the manual of the Aircraft for more information including the extended checklist: 
https://forum.inibuilds.com/topic/5958-is-there-a-manual/

0:00 intro
0:10 going inside the cockpit (finding the checklists)
2:05 preliminary cockpit preparation
12:38 flight deck preparation
43:35 before start checklist
45:40 engine start procedure
51: 15 after start procedure
